page.title: 02GROSMONT 2 BUILDINGS
page.content: Although most people come to{Grosmont to see the{castle}and the{church}they find there are a lot more interests to see in our village.The stone castle is built on the site of an earlier wooden {Motte and Bailey castle. It has a large ditch around it.There is a Great Hall inside and towers on most of the corners.The castle has been a ruin for years but at one point you can climb up to the very top of a wall.One of the most attractive things about the castle is the chimney which is still complete with its carved stone decorations.{St.Nicholas' Church was built by{Hubert De Burg}at the same time as the castle under the order of{Queen Eleanor}.Since the Victorian Restoration the Old Nave, which is is paved with grave stones is not in use for services.Pamphlets about both buildings are available.
